name: Frozen Souls
description:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/Dillo

Use the equipment left behind by fallen adventurers to survive 7 days on the island, until you are rescued. The solar panels will recharge your battery, which you can then insert into the heater to melt the snowmen haunting the island.

Controls

MovementWASDInteract with objectsE

*Remember to take your battery out of the heater once you have used it*

Credits

SFX - freesound.org

Everything else - Dillo
